title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.15 - Exemptions from the requirements of article 4-c of the economic development law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.15 - Exemptions from the requirements of article 4-c of the economic development law

State Regulations

In light of the terrorist attack in New York City on

September 11, 2001 and the declaration of a disaster emergency by the Governor, the Comptroller hereby exempts all contracts deemed necessary to address the
disaster emergency from the publication requirements contained in article 4-C
of the Economic Development Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
7.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
